src:
TSC bolji od Radničkog, remi Mačve i Čukaričkog, „golubovi“ izuli „čarapane“
03 Nov 2019, 17:07 by Milos
Kompletirano je 15. kolo Linglong Super lige Srbije.
TSC je u Senti bio bolji od niškog Radničkog, i tako zadržao petu poziciju na tabeli. Dvostruki strelac za domaće bio je Nenad Lukić, koji je pogodio u 47. i 80. minutu.
Spartak je odneo bodove iz Kruševca, a junak susreta bio je strelac pobedonosnog gola Stefan Šormaz u 28. minutu. Spartak je od 58. minuta igrao bez isključenog Ivana Dokića.
Voždovac je vodio sa 2:0 u Surdulici zahvaljujući dvostrukom strelcu Alenu Mašoviću (48. i 72. minut) do samog finiša, ali je Radnik preko Filipa Stanisavljevića četiri minuta pre kraja i Jevgena Pavlova u sudijskoj nadoknadi stigao do boda.
Utakmice Mačva – Čukarički i Rad – Mladost završene su bez pogodaka, a njaviše golova viđeno je u Inđiji, gde je Javor pogotkom Nikole Petkovića iz jedanaesterca u samom finišu stigao do tri boda. Poveo je Javor preko Marka Kolakovića u 31. minutu. Inđija je preokrenula pogotkom Filipa Rajevca u 47. i autogolom Alekse Amanovića u 49. minutu, a drugi gol za Inđiju postigao je takođe Petković u 80. minutu.
INĐIJA – JAVOR MATIS 2:3 (0:1)MAČVA – ČUKARIČKI 0:0NAPREDAK – SPARTAK ŽK 0:1 (0:1)RAD – MLADOST 0:0RADNIK – VOŽDOVAC 2:2 (0:0)TSC – RADNIČKI NIŠ 2:0 (0:0)
Odigrano u subotu:
PARTIZAN – VOJVODINA 4:0 (2:0)PROLETER – CRVENA ZVEZDA 0:2 (0:0)
Tabela: Crvena zvezda 39 (-1), Čukarički 33 (-1), Vojvodina 30, Partizan 29 (-1), TSC 28, Voždovac 25, Radnički 25, Spartak 21, Javor 19, Mladost 19, Proleter 16, Napredak 15, Radnik 15 (-1), Rad 8, Inđija 7, Mačva 4.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
TSC better than Radnicki, draws of Macva and Cukaricki, "pigeons" hatch "socks"
03 Nov 2019, 16:07 by Milos
The 15th round of the Linglong Super League of Serbia was completed.
TSC was better than Nis Worker in Senta, retaining the fifth position on the table. The home side double scorer was Nenad Lukic, who scored in the 47th and 80th minutes.
Spartak took away points from Krusevac, and the hero of the match was the scorer of the winning goal Stefan Šormaz in the 28th minute. Spartak played without Ivan Dokic from the 58th minute.
Vozdovac led 2-0 in Surdulica thanks to double scorer Alen Mašović (48th and 72nd minutes) to the finish line, but Radnik, through Filip Stanisavljevic, four minutes before the end and Yevgen Pavlov in the referee's point reached the point.
The matches of Mačva - Čukarički and Rad - Mladost were finished without a hit, and the most goals were seen in Indjija, where Javor scored three points with a single shot from Nikola Petković from the penalty spot. He led Javor over Marko Kolakovic in the 31st minute. Indjija turned it over with a goal by Filip Rajevac in the 47th and a goal by Aleksa Amanovic in the 49th minute, while Petkovic scored in the 80th minute as well.
INDJIJA - JAVOR MATIS 2: 3 (0: 1) MATCHA - CHUKARICKI 0: 0METWEAR - SPARTAK LC 0: 1 (0: 1) WORK - YOUTH 0: 0RADNIK - VOZDOVAC 2: 2 (0: 0) TSC - RADNIČKI NIS 2 : 0 (0: 0)
Played on Saturday:
PARTIZAN - VOJVODINA 4: 0 (2: 0) PROLETER - RED STAR 0: 2 (0: 0)
Table: Red Star 39 (-1), Cukaricki 33 (-1), Vojvodina 30, Partizan 29 (-1), TSC 28, Vozdovac 25, Radnicki 25, Spartak 21, Maple 19, Mladost 19, Proleter 16, Progress 15 , Worker 15 (-1), Work 8, Indjija 7, Sword 4.
